Favorite language/runtime

Recently I've been porting a few of my apps to node-webkit, the greatest language I've ever worked with. I originally used AppJS for my Kickstarter project YouParty. AppJS has since been abandoned and while looking for a replacement I found node-webkit.

New Blog

I decided to create this blog to keep track of the things I work on. Hopefully I'll post here every day.
